posts.postText: It should have its own subforum for JB, because its not like they are banned, and people mistake it and post it in JB anyways.

This has been done. Would someone like to make a format(similar to ban request) for blacklists?

thx

Can someone add some guidelines on what to post in your blacklist/unblacklist request?

Edit: Never mind, I figured out how to make an announcement.  Also, Can we somehow make that section for unblacklists too?

Edit edit: Make that forum for unblacklists also please...
